Description: Is there a chance I would just get mild symptoms of the virus? Or because I am diabetic, that is unlikely?
DialogueText:
Patient:
Is there a chance I would just get mild symptoms of the virus? Or because I am diabetic, that is unlikely?
Doctor:
Diabetes and COVID. In all cases, the better the blood sugar is controlled, the better the immune system can function. Eating healthy, exercising as tolerated, and control blood sugars are close to normal as your doctor advises, is the best plan. .
